subject: Updates on order #SSN1807
description_text:
Good afternoon,

I ordered from Simsson and am still waiting for updates on the shipment.
Please let me know what's going on with the shifter and wheel.



Best regards,

Kokou Donald Daglo MBA, PMP, CISM, CFCM
Alexandria, VA 22302
813.570.2398

*kokoudaglo@gmail.com <kokoudaglo@gmail.com>*

*donalddaglo@gmail.com <donalddaglo@gmail.com>*

conversations.body_text: Hi Donald Daglo,    Here's a link to your logistics tracking, the first package is expected to arrive on the 1st and the other is expected to arrive around the 5th.  https://t.17track.net/en#nums=882217460043,JSEXU2381207029YQ

Thank you for the update, but why is the wheel being sent from China? I was
under the impression that I'd receive both items at once, but I saw
multiple cancellations of the shipment for the order, and now I'm only
getting one link from China. I don't understand why you will cancel the
shipment after sending the tracking number twice and then sending one from
China, which will take even longer to arrive. This makes zero sense at all.
If I had known it would be this, I would have just ordered one from China
myself.



Best regards,

Kokou Donald Daglo MBA, PMP, CISM, CFCM
Alexandria, VA 22302
813.570.2398

*kokoudaglo@gmail.com <kokoudaglo@gmail.com>*

*donalddaglo@gmail.com <donalddaglo@gmail.com>*



On Mon, Jun 30, 2025 at 6:53â€¯AM service@simsonn.com
Hi Donald Daglo,     Sorry, the steering wheel is out of stock at our US warehouse, and in order to get it to you in time, we have chosen to ship it from China for you.
